Package assn3

Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
assn3.Recipe
public class Recipe extends Object
The Recipe class models a recipe with multiple ingredients and their corresponding quantities. It provides methods to retrieve and modify the recipe's name, ingredients, and ordered quantity.
Since:
17.0.11
Version:
1.01
Author:
Ha Nhu Y Tran
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(String recipeName, float eggs, float yeast, float flour, float sugar, float butter)
      Constructs a new Recipe object with the identified recipe name and ingredients.
      Parameters:
      recipeName - the name of the recipe
      eggs - the number of eggs required for the recipe
      yeast - the amount of yeast (in grams) required for the recipe
      flour - the amount of flour (in grams) required for the recipe
      sugar - the amount of sugar (in grams) required for the recipe
      butter - the amount of butter (in grams) required for the recipe
